# Subnautica Modding Reference Links

### Harmony
A popular library for patching and modifying game code at runtime, widely used in Subnautica mods. Automatically included by BepInEx.
- [Source Code](https://github.com/pardeike/Harmony)
- [API Docs](https://harmony.pardeike.net/api/index.html)

### BepInEx
A powerful modding framework that provides plugin loading, patching, and other utilities for Subnautica mods.
- [Source Code](https://github.com/BepInEx/BepInEx/)
- [API Docs](https://docs.bepinex.dev/master/api/index.html)
- [NexusMods Page](https://www.nexusmods.com/subnautica/mods/1108)

### Nautilus
A popular modding library specifically designed for Subnautica, providing utilities for prefab creation, localization, and more.
- [Source Code](https://github.com/SubnauticaModding/Nautilus)
- [API Docs](https://subnauticamodding.github.io/Nautilus/index.html)
- [NexusMods Page](https://www.nexusmods.com/subnautica/mods/1262)
- _Requires_: **BepInEx**

### ECC Library
A Subnautica library for creating custom creatures.
- [Source Code](https://github.com/32Kallies/ECCLibrary)
<!-- - [API Docs]() -->
- [NexusMods Page](https://www.nexusmods.com/subnautica/mods/1457)
- _Requires_: **BepInEx**, **Nautilus**

### SuitLib
A Subnautica library for creating custom suits.
- [Source Code](https://github.com/Indigocoder1/Indigocoder_SubnauticaMods/tree/master/SuitLib)
<!-- - [API Docs]() -->
- [NexusMods Page](https://www.nexusmods.com/subnautica/mods/1381)
- _Requires_: **BepInEx**, **Nautilus**
